movies.title: Hera Pheri
movies.description: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper.
movies.review: A classic comedy with unforgettable performances.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.
movies.review: A dark and thrilling superhero film.

movies.title: 3 Idiots
movies.description: Two friends embark on a quest for a lost buddy. On this journey, they encounter a long forgotten bet, a wedding they must crash, and a funeral that goes impossibly out of control.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Andaz Apna Apna
movies.description: Two slackers competing for the affections of an heiress inadvertently become involved in a plot to save the world.
movies.review: A cult classic comedy with hilarious moments.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Munna Bhai M.B.B.S.
movies.description: A gangster sets out to fulfill his father's dream of becoming a doctor despite having no formal education.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.

movies.title: Hera Pheri
movies.description: Three unemployed men find the answer to all their money problems when they receive a call from a kidnapper.
movies.review: A classic comedy with unforgettable performances.

movies.title: The Pursuit of Happyness
movies.description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

movies.title: Chak De! India
movies.description: Kabir Khan is the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team and dreams of winning the gold medal at the World Championship. However, he has lost the support of the board and most of the players. To make matters worse, he is constantly at odds with the team's captain, who wants to succeed on her own terms.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.description: A legendary concierge at a famous European hotel between the wars and his friendship with a young employee who becomes his trusted protégé.

movies.title: Andhadhun
movies.description: A series of mysterious events take place in the life of a blind pianist.
movies.review: A thrilling ride with unexpected twists.

movies.title: Call of Duty
movies.description: An army of soldiers going on a war mission to rescue people in the local villages
movies.review: The movie was good. Need a more twist plot
